title: checkStatus
description: the content of the object to be provided by the IServiceable to let check if a service is up and running

startable.comment: whether the service is startable without any other intervention

reasons.comment: if the service is running, then the list of detected errors, must be empty if startable

pids.comment: list of pids which must been checked to be alive, must be empty if startable

ports.comment: list of TCP ports which must been checked against 'iz.ping' and 'iz.status' commands, must be empty if startable
